MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY9 postcode area of Leven. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm to replace a faulty fuse unit at the Elie House substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.28pm on Friday 23rd October 2020.
